episode_event_winter_2023/4001_1101_0100: During the preparations for the winter party...
episode_event_winter_2023/4001_1001_0200: All of you, hear my words!
episode_event_winter_2023/4001_1001_0300:
At this year’s winter party, we will be hosting a
photo contest!
episode_event_winter_2023/4001_1001_0400: A photo contest? Are we supposed to take photos?
episode_event_winter_2023/4001_1001_0600:
Take photos during the event, and send me your
best picture that will touch the most hearts!
episode_event_winter_2023/4001_1001_0700:
Of course, if you attend the party, that means you
agree to have your photo taken!
episode_event_winter_2023/4001_1001_0800:
Attendees should dress up and stay focused, as
they can be photographed at any time!
episode_event_winter_2023/4001_1001_0900:
Fantastic! Just fantastic! It’s an event that’s perfect
for me!
episode_event_winter_2023/4001_1001_1000:
Photos can capture a moment that shows the bond
between a Trainer and Pokémon.
episode_event_winter_2023/4001_1001_1100:
As a researcher, I'm very interested in
participating.
episode_event_winter_2023/4001_1001_1200:
But why did he come up with this idea all of
a sudden?
episode_event_winter_2023/4001_1001_1300:
Well, the thing is...the young master recently
bought a high-tech camera.
episode_event_winter_2023/4001_1001_1400:
So he’s, like, suuuuper hyped about taking some
awesome photos.
episode_event_winter_2023/4001_1001_1500: I see. So, it’s his new hobby, huh...
episode_event_winter_2023/4001_1001_1600:
All right! I’ll try to get the winning shot with
perfect dance moves in the snow!
episode_event_winter_2023/4001_1001_1700:
I’ll write a report about the winter party and add
a photo to it!
episode_event_winter_2023/4001_1001_1800:
I will be looking forward to your best
photographs!
episode_event_winter_2023/4001_1001_1900: Ehehe... I can’t wait to get to work!
episode_event_winter_2023/6801_1001_0100:
I’m not used to taking photos...but I enjoy spotting
memorable moments! That’s something I’m good at!
episode_event_winter_2023/6801_1001_0200:
I may not be as good as a professional
photographer like you, Viola, but I hope to take
some nice pictures!
episode_event_winter_2023/6801_1001_0400: Let’s do our best! And above all, let’s have fun!
episode_event_winter_2023/4002_1101_0100: On the day of the winter party...
episode_event_winter_2023/4002_1001_0200: Look, Professor Sycamore! It’s a Sylveon!
episode_event_winter_2023/4002_1001_0300: He looks perfect for the party!
episode_event_winter_2023/4002_1001_0400: Nice! Now then, let me just...
episode_event_winter_2023/4002_1001_0500: Oh, wait. I accidentally clicked video mode...
episode_event_winter_2023/4002_1001_0600:
They walked away while you were trying to figure
that out.
episode_event_winter_2023/4002_1001_0700:
I always thought Professor Sycamore was stylish
and mature, but...
episode_event_winter_2023/4002_1001_0800: There are times when he’s kind of clumsy.
episode_event_winter_2023/4002_1001_0900:
It’s a side of him we don’t usually get the chance
to see! ♪
episode_event_winter_2023/4002_1001_1100: You all look fantastic! Just fantastic!
episode_event_winter_2023/4002_1001_1200:
I-It's true what they say—you don't let a single
smile escape your focus!
episode_event_winter_2023/4002_1001_1300:
Hey, Viola. Do you have any tips for taking a
good photo?
episode_event_winter_2023/4002_1001_1400:
Hmm... Well, first of all, don’t strain yourself to
take the best shot.
episode_event_winter_2023/4002_1001_1500:
The photographer and the subject both need to be
natural. Otherwise, you’ll miss your opportunity!
episode_event_winter_2023/4002_1001_1700:
Oh, I know! Can you teach us more photography
tips, Viola?
episode_event_winter_2023/4002_1001_1900:
I’m happy that everyone’s interested in taking
photos!
episode_event_winter_2023/4002_1001_2200: you look very fashionable, Professor Sycamore!
episode_event_winter_2023/4002_1001_2300:
Ahaha, Lear did tell us to be prepared to be
photographed at any time.
episode_event_winter_2023/4002_1001_2400: Serena and I helped the Professor style his hair! ♪
episode_event_winter_2023/4002_1001_2500: He’s Lumiose City’s stylish Pokémon Professor!
episode_event_winter_2023/4002_1001_2600: We need him to look nice at opportunities like this!
episode_event_winter_2023/4002_1001_2700: Yeah, I hadn’t planned to style my hair...
episode_event_winter_2023/4002_1001_2800: Thank you both for helping me with that.
episode_event_winter_2023/4002_1001_3000: By the way, you also look great, Viola.
episode_event_winter_2023/4002_1001_3300: Valerie gave me advice on what to wear!
episode_event_winter_2023/4002_1001_3400:
I brought my wonderful partner who’s a perfect fit
for the winter party, so I’m ready for our photo to
be taken!
episode_event_winter_2023/4002_1001_3500: Oh yeah! She’s white as snow!
episode_event_winter_2023/4002_1001_3600:
I first met my Vivillon long ago when I was taking
photos on a snowy mountain!
episode_event_winter_2023/4002_1001_3700:
The pattern on Vivillon is different depending on
the region it’s from, right?
episode_event_winter_2023/4002_1001_3900:
Today’s a special day, so some Trainers might’ve
brought partner Pokémon that you don’t usually
see them with!
episode_event_winter_2023/4002_1001_4000: Let’s all go find the perfect moment!
episode_event_winter_2023/4003_1001_0100: C’mon, Jasmine! Give us a flashier smile!
episode_event_winter_2023/4003_1001_0300: What’s the matter? Do you need help with photos?
episode_event_winter_2023/4003_1001_0500:
I-I get nervous when someone points their
camera at me...
episode_event_winter_2023/4003_1001_0600: She can’t help it, but her smile gets stiff.
episode_event_winter_2023/4003_1001_0700:
It’s a shame, ’cause a photo of three pretty girls
smiling would definitely win the competition.
episode_event_winter_2023/4003_1001_0900:
Gogoat is touching Sawsbuck’s horns, as if he’s
saying hello!
episode_event_winter_2023/4003_1001_1000:
I’ve heard that Gogoat can sense the feelings of
others with its horns.
episode_event_winter_2023/4003_1001_1100:
Yeah! He usually helps me out with my research
by sensing how other Pokémon or people feel.
episode_event_winter_2023/4003_1001_1200:
And wild Gogoat determine their herd leader by
clashing their horns, right?
episode_event_winter_2023/4003_1001_1300:
So, to put it another way, their horns can also be
their weapon when they fight.
episode_event_winter_2023/4003_1001_1400:
But Professor Sycamore’s Gogoat is a gentleman,
similar to his Trainer.
episode_event_winter_2023/4003_1001_1500:
A gentlemanly Gogoat... That reminds me of the
Gogoat Shuttle in Lumiose City.
episode_event_winter_2023/4003_1001_1700:
Lumiose City is big, so Gogoat let people ride them
to travel around.
episode_event_winter_2023/4003_1001_1800: That’s it, Jasmine! Why don’t you ride on Gogoat?
episode_event_winter_2023/4003_1001_2000:
A pretty girl with a Pokémon makes a great
picture! Everyone knows that!
episode_event_winter_2023/4003_1001_2100: Fantastic! I’d love to snap that shot!
episode_event_winter_2023/4003_1001_2200: Is it fine for Gogoat, Professor Sycamore?
episode_event_winter_2023/4003_1001_2500:
Erm, Gogoat... Don’t speed up too much when
I’m on you, OK?
episode_event_winter_2023/4003_1001_2600: A-aaaaah! I told you to go slow!
episode_event_winter_2023/4004_1001_0100: What do you think? Looks good, right?
episode_event_winter_2023/4004_1001_0200: Hey! Half of the photo is your face, Raihan!
episode_event_winter_2023/4004_1001_0300: Hi! Are you all entering the photo contest?
episode_event_winter_2023/4004_1001_0500:
Could you take a photo of us so that we’re all
equally visible, please?
episode_event_winter_2023/4004_1001_0600: Of course! Please assist me, Vivillon!
episode_event_winter_2023/4004_1001_0700:
Huh? I thought we were taking a photo to submit
for the contest...
episode_event_winter_2023/4004_1001_0800:
Are we allowed to submit a photo that someone
else took?
episode_event_winter_2023/4004_1001_0900: We ended up just taking a group photo together...
episode_event_winter_2023/4005_1001_0100: Now that’s a rare photo op!
episode_event_winter_2023/4005_1001_0200:
Everyone! Can you look this way, please? I’m
going to take a photo!
episode_event_winter_2023/4006_1001_0100: Your scarf looks really cute, Elesa!
episode_event_winter_2023/4006_1001_0200:
And it looks warm, too. I should’ve prepared
something like that.
episode_event_winter_2023/4006_1001_0300:
Would you like me to lend it to you some day?
You could try wearing it with some of your outfits.
episode_event_winter_2023/4006_1001_0400: Did you get better at dancing, Tierno?
episode_event_winter_2023/4006_1001_0500:
Of course! I always practice, whether it rains
or snows!
episode_event_winter_2023/4006_1001_0600: Everyone is having fun, so this’ll be a great shot!
episode_event_winter_2023/4006_1001_1300:
Oh? I smell something nice... Where’s it
coming from?
episode_event_winter_2023/4007_1001_0100: The Professor was right. They’re giving out coffee.
episode_event_winter_2023/4007_1001_0200:
Wow! The Professor really loves coffee,
doesn’t he?
episode_event_winter_2023/4007_1001_0300: Let’s have a small break, everyone! It’s my treat!
episode_event_winter_2023/4007_1001_0600: Take a photo of the food instead of me...
episode_event_winter_2023/4007_1001_0700:
If cooking is art, a chef deserves to be a part of
the artwork! Don’t you agree?
episode_event_winter_2023/4007_1001_1000:
Yup! Vivillon’s wings are reflecting the light,
and it looks perfect!
episode_event_winter_2023/4007_1001_1200:
If you attend the party, that means you agree to
have your photo taken!
episode_event_winter_2023/4007_1001_1300:
The photographer and the subject both need to be
natural. Otherwise, you’ll miss your opportunity!
episode_event_winter_2023/4007_1001_1400: We need to be natural, right?
episode_event_winter_2023/4008_1001_0200: Congratulations on winning the contest, Professor!
episode_event_winter_2023/4008_1001_0300:
They said it was a wonderful photo capturing the
natural bond between Viola and Vivillon during
the party!
episode_event_winter_2023/4008_1001_0400: It’s all thanks to Viola’s tips!
episode_event_winter_2023/4008_1001_0500: I lost the contest, but I won as the subject...
episode_event_winter_2023/4008_1001_0600: I’m not sure how to feel!
episode_event_winter_2023/4008_1001_0700:
It’s all right! You look very pretty in the photo,
don’t you think?
episode_event_winter_2023/4008_1001_0800: That’s because you helped me with my outfit...
episode_event_winter_2023/4008_1001_0900: No, I see your genuine charm in the photo.
episode_event_winter_2023/4008_1001_1100:
Now that I think about it, that’s probably the first
time I’ve experienced what it feels like to have my
photo taken...
episode_event_winter_2023/4008_1001_1200:
I’ve also become interested in taking photos,
thanks to the party!
episode_event_winter_2023/4008_1001_1300:
I’d like to continue taking photos of memorable
moments I can find in my day-to-day life.
episode_event_winter_2023/4008_1001_1500:
I hope more and more people discover the joys
of photography!
